title: Forces acting on a person on a rotating disk

content.question: A person is riding a distance <math alttext="r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>r</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from the center of a rotating platform, as shown in Figure 1. The person is moving with a constant linear speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. For the view looking down on the person in Figure 2, which of the following best shows the direction of the net force exerted by the platform on the person?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing vertically upward.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing upward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow pointing upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the left.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.
